Enrollments

made easy.
Take your school -to- online today. Enrolling kids to new programs, extended care, after school activities, etc. — just a click away! It's quick & easy for everyone. Parents love it.

Documents

organize. clutter free.
Our smart tech automagically organizes your student forms/documents for you. Making them available at your fingertips when you need ‘em. We clear clutter out of your school.
Did we tell you? next time, ask parent to submit forms, send documents online! they are stored for lifetime in the cloud for your convenience. Safety, Security and Privacy are guaranteed.

Organize kids forms/documents for them to be available at your fingertips when you need ‘em.
Did we tell you? next time, ask parents to submit forms, send documents online. They are stored forever. Accessible any time.

Moments

capture your classroom in action. share.
Parents just love to see kids in action. And you may be that lucky one to see ‘em at first hand! Capture & Share whenever you want!! Even a cute word they just said!!!

By sharing, you are creating a sense of care, building a healthy bond and more than anything else an entry to child’s life full of memories. creating child’s life time memories

Reminders

focus on whats more important…kids.
Remembering day -to- day matters is a daunting task. Birthdays. Holidays. Parent Reminders. Due Dates. Asking all parents to bring toys tomorrow…aaahh! you got the idea.

Well, you don’t have to do it alone. Our smart reminders — timely notifications are here to free you up. Highly customizable, configurable and most reliable. Take that mental time-off today!

We know remembering day -to- day matters is a daunting task. And when it comes to classroom, even worse. Birthdays. Holidays. Special Occassions. Due Dates.…aaahh!

Well, you are not alone now. Our smart reminders — timely notifications are here to free you up. Highly customizable, configurable and most reliable. Take that mental time-off today!

Sign-In/Out

iSIGHT. Automagically works.
iSIGHT makes student sign-in/out seamless. No kiosks. No hassle of charging. Moves around with you. Teachers are no exemption.
We also provide an advanced pin based solution for your smart phone to track sign-in/out.

Reports

Track. Print. Export.
Ability to view-export-print vivid collection of schools performance reports for Teacher, School Administrator makes our platform perfect fit.
Export. Save. Print. Whenever you want. Wherever you want. Available across our mobile/web platforms.

Messaging

Start a conversation. Realtime.
Whether you intend to communicate with an individual parent or group of parents, parent messaging is never been so much easier & fun. Messages around kid are always visible to class teacher(s).
